benchmark_details.name: BanglaNLP at BLP-2023 Task 2: Benchmarking different Transformer Models for Sentiment Analysis of Bangla Social Media Posts
benchmark_details.overview: This paper presents a benchmark for sentiment analysis of Bangla social media posts, using various Transformer-based architectures to quantify model performance in this low-resource language scenario.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To benchmark different transformer models for sentiment analysis of Bangla social media posts and evaluate their effectiveness in a low-resource language.

data.source: Datasets from two distinct sources: MUBASE (manually annotated Tweets and Facebook posts) and SentNob (public comments from social media).

methodology.calculation: Micro F1 is calculated by counting true positives, false negatives, and false positives globally.
methodology.interpretation: Micro F1 indicates how well the model predicts the correct sentiment class.
methodology.baseline_results: Micro-F1 of 67.02% on the test set.
methodology.validation: Model performance validated on a dedicated test set after prior training.
